name: Cycle of Failure
description:
"Cycle of Failure" is a dark puzzle game about making the right choices to avoid failing at your life over and over again. 

Controls and info:
Move: "A" and "D"
Interact: "E" (There is no indicator for interactable objects.)
Choose Dialog-Options with your mouse

Warning:
Running around might trigger new monologs, which can(and most likely will) overwrite the current one.

Plot:
*Spoilers ahead* 
(We highly recommend figuring out the main plot out by yourself!)
Live is hard, especially for the protagonist of "Cycle of Failure", but he has something we don't have... multiple chances! Failing at life, may it be by actually dying, losing his job or other rather unfortunate events, will cause the protagonist to be stuck in an infinite repetition of the day until he finds a way to avoid all the possible tragedies. The only question remaining: Is this a blessing and a curse?

Created by: Janis Bögershausen & Lasse Häckl
